paginator.items-left-display-when-no-other-pages.c: This is displayed when there's either no items on the page or there's only one page
paginator.items-left-when-other-pages-exist.commen: This is displayed when there are other pages to explore. It'll show you the range of items you're on and how many there are left

crit-tables.Star Wars FFG Eote Crit Table: Star Wars FFG Eote Crit Table
crit-tables.Star Wars FFG Eote Vehicle Crit Table: Star Wars FFG Eote Vehicle Crit Table

labels.link-copied.comment: The link-copied value will pop up usually after a user hits a button that's puts a URL into a user's clipboard. This message lets the user know the URL was copied successfully
labels.rpg-sessions-mark-alt-text.comment: Alt-text shows up whenever an image fails to load, this alt-text will be used for the Sessions logo in mark form (the circle version)
labels.select-list-none.comment: The none key below is used in select lists to indicate that the user doesn't want to select any of the options in the list.
labels.cancel-button-text.comment: The following will be used on cancel buttons throughout the app

profile.linked-account-description: Link your RPG Sessions profile to unlock awesome features!

import-overlay.non-patron-custom-data-warning: Warning: The OggDude importer does not currently support custom data for non-patron members.
import-overlay.create-import-file-instructions: To create the import file to upload, go to the data editor and hit "Back Up", then select only Data Custom and press back up.
import-overlay.custom-oggdude-data-not-imported: Warning: You have no custom data imported, custom data in your character sheet will be ignored.
import-overlay.custom-oggdude-data-already-imported:
Good news! You have custom data imported. Custom data in your character sheet
will be loaded.
import-overlay.custom-oggdude-data-confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete your custom OggDude data?
import-overlay.overwrite-ignored-label: When you overwrite a character, all but the following will be replaced:
import-overlay.import-limit-description: It appears you've hit your import limit for the month.
import-overlay.import-limit-patreon-tier-error: In order to import more characters this month, you'll need to consider increasing your <a href="https://www.patreon.com/rpgsessions" rel="noopener" target="_blank" >Patreon</a > tier.
import-overlay.import-limit-no-patreon-error: In order to import more characters this month, you'll need to consider becoming a Patreon.
import-overlay.import-limit-linking-instructions: If you're already a Patron of ours, make sure you link your account on your account settings page.
import-overlay.patreon-only-error-warning: This feature is currently available only to our Patron members. If you'd like to join our Patreon to use this feature, check out our page on Patreon.com.
import-overlay.patreon-only-error-call-to-action: If you're already a Patron of ours, make sure you link your account on your account settings page.
import-overlay.drop-file-prompt: Drop {{ fileType }} file here or click to upload

overlays.help.comment: This help section text shows up in the help dialog on the dice roller. It's broken into two sections for each question: category title and category description. The title is the question and the description is the answer

categoryDescriptions.category-description: Click on the dice you would like to add to the tray from a dice collection.
Click on the dice in the tray you would like to remove.

categoryDescriptions.category-title: How to make a dice chain:
categoryDescriptions.category-description: Select the dice you want in the dice chain, add a description, and click on "Create Roll Chain." From the new screen, click "Copy Link" and send it to your fellow gamer by pasting the link.

categoryDescriptions.category-title: How to roll from a dice chain link:
categoryDescriptions.category-description: Click on the dice chain link. Add your dice to the tray, and click "Roll Dice."

new-game-prompt.prompt-title: Choose the platform for your new game
new-game-prompt.create-sessions-game-title: Name your game and select the type of game
new-game-prompt.create-discord-game-link-instruction-tex: The below link instructions are shown when you try to create a discord game but do not have discord linked to your RPG Sessions account. Their intent is to tell you how to link your Discord account to RPG Sessions.
Before you can create a Discord game, you need to link your RPG Sessions account with Discord.
It only takes a second and is done from your account profile.
new-game-prompt.create-discord-game-instruction-text.com: The below instruction text is shown when you go to create a Discord game and your account is successfully linked to Discord already
new-game-prompt.create-discord-game-instruction-text: Invite the bot to your server and a game will be automatically created here! (You might need to refresh this list to see your new game)
new-game-prompt.invite-bot-button-text.comment: The following button is how users invite the discord bot to their server

footer-items.bot-help.comment: The bot-help key is used to link the user to the help PDF for bot commands
footer-items.build.comment: The build is the version number for the application, the user can check it to make sure they're on the newest version number and it's useful for seeing what features are available to the version the user has. This will typically have a value next to it like v0.11.12.0 or something.
